name: Idle Snakes-Control Balls
description:
Just click and release the snake, collect energy, train the snakes to grow up, continue to devour the ball, and grow to a higher level!
tap and tap, the snake grows up, devours all the balls in the sky, grows up and grows up!

Features:
Easy to click and play
Unlock and upgrade the snake
Automatic swallowed balls
Powerful special effects snake
